comments.content:
i thought:

Berthold Azidenz Grotesk  
Din 1451 Std

maybe.

YOu should check out some more of Josef Muller Brockmann, if you dont know him by now, a god on the european design scene. It is indeed akzidenz.

[http://www.imagenow.ie/gallery/flash.htm](http://web.archive.org/web/20110812151447/http:/www.imagenow.ie/gallery/flash.htm "http://www.imagenow.ie/gallery/flash.htm")

this site has a lot of his greatest posters on them
I think the image you posted is a little squashed, if you go to week 3 on the link then you will see more posters in the same group.
